subject: Attn: To Foreign Beneficiary
body:
Attn: To Foreign Beneficiary
 UBA BANK PLC
   ACCRA - GH.
 
 
Sir,
 
Good Afternoon to You.    
 
UBA Bank Plc.
Mail Notice.
 I am MR.ASARE DANIEL. A highly placed official of the UBA BANK PLC ACCRA - GHANA, on  foreign Remittance Department.
We wish to know if you are still alive in good health. In respect to your unpaid payment of $3.5 Millions Dollar with the Royal Bank Of Asia. All Governmental and Non-Governmental prostates, NGOs, Banks, Security Companies which have been in contact with you of late have been instructed to back up from your transaction and you have been advised NOT to respond to them anymore since the IMF with UNITED BANK FOR AFRICA  PLC. Is now directly in charge of your( FUND $3.5 M).
 Which is pending in our ( ESCROW ACCOUNT). In respect to wire transfer, for the fact it will attract a fee which will cost to obtain documentations for international wire K.TT Transfer.
 The bank has mapped out a short cut for you to receive these funds via ATM CARD, which you are only charged $685.
 The ATM Card works in 89 countries in the world, this is the reason the bank contacted you to receive your funds without any further hindrances.
 The ATM CARD will be posted to you through DHL. Which will arrive at your doorstep within 3/4 days. We await your feedback intentions to enable us to send you information to send the required fee.
 Your ATM CARD will be posted this next Tuesday based on you as soon as you send the required fee to the bank that will process your payment.
 Your mail response will highly be appreciated to enable us to proceed further. Reply to: 
ubaban.remit.dept@hotmail.com
 
Yours Sincerely,
 
Mr. Daniel Asare
Remit. Director UBA Bank Plc.
Accra - Ghana Breach.
Tel: +233-268-976-544
Code 000066112023

subject: Re: Attn: To Foreign Beneficiary
body:
Hello Mr. Daniel Asare,

Good day to you! I hope this message finds you well. I am indeed alive and in good health, thank you for your concern.

I must say, your email has taken me by surprise. I wasn't aware of any unpaid payment of Millions Dollar with the Royal Bank Of Asia. Could you please provide more details about this? How did this come about?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the ATM card method? It sounds very convenient but I'm not quite sure how it works. Will the card have my name on it? And how can I use it to access the funds?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: Attn: To Foreign Beneficiary
body:
*Attn: To *Ruth









* Foreign Beneficiary UBA BANK PLC   ACCRA - GH.        Sir, Good Afternoon
to You. UBA Bank Plc.*
*We acknowledged the receipt of your mail response.*

*The Board of Directors, Bank Of Africa (BOA) has ordered our Remittance
Unit through our Automated Teller Machine (ATM) Department to issue you a
CORPORATE ATM VISA MASTER CARD.*

*In respect to the fee amount $695 only required  It's for account opening
and ATM Card processing. These should be on your own accounts. is a must
that you the beneficiary will cover expenses involved for the transaction
of these $3.5 millions US Dollars.*

*Kindly send it immediately through western Union/ Ria.*


*Receiver Name.Charity - AlornyekuAddress:54 Lapaz Road, Accra Ghana.*
*Amount: $695 only.*











*Your mail response will highly be appreciated. Thank You; Yours
Sincerely,         Remit. Director UBA Bank Plc.Accra - Ghana Breach.Tel:
+233–535-078-139.Code 0000661120*

subject: Re: Attn: To Foreign Beneficiary
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this CORPORATE ATM VISA MASTER CARD. Could you please provide more details about it? How does it work and what are the benefits of having one?

Also, I'm curious about the fee for account opening and ATM Card. Is this a standard procedure for all new accounts? 

I'm not familiar with sending money through Western Union Ria. Could you guide me on how to do that? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: Attn: To Foreign Beneficiary
body:
*Attn: To Deborah  Foreign Beneficiary  UBA BANK PLC    ACCRA - GH.
  UBA Bank Plc. Good Afternoon To You. Madam, We acknowledge the receipt of
your email response? The Board of Directors, Bank Of Africa (BOA) has
ordered our Remittance Unit through our Automated Teller Machine (ATM)
Department to issue you a CORPORATE ATM VISA MASTER CARD.   Where your
payment will be uploaded. And will allow you to withdraw your fund in a
maximum amount of US$2,000/US$4,000 per day in any visa ATM Machine
worldwide without any query from any authority. You are hereby required to
download the attach file which is our bank account application FORM fill it
and forward it back to us with a scan copy of your passport ID. Honestly,
an Atm Card is the best option to receive your funds payment smoothly
without any problems. Based on your question about the fee, it's a fixed
fee required. The account opening fee/Atm Card processing is just £685
kindly send it through western union or world remit/Ria with the below name
information.by <http://information.by> next week Tuesday your Atm Visa
Master Card will be out loaded with the funds FUND $3.5 M.For delivery to
your home address. 1. Full Names:........ 2. Mobile No:......... 3.
Occupations:........ 4. Home Address:...... Receiver's Name: CHARITY -
ALORNYEKU Address: Plot 54 Lapaz Road, Accra - Ghana.*
* Fee Amount: £685*


*Notice we have also sent you mail through our official mail box, kindly be
responding from there: *info.ubabankremitdept.gh@linuxmail.org












* Thanks For your Cooperation. Your mail response will highly be
appreciated.   Yours Sincerely,           Remit. Director UBA Bank Plc.
Accra - Ghana Breach. Tel: +233–535-078-139. Code 000066112024 Transit Code
2024*

subject: Re: Attn: To Foreign Beneficiary
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your email. It's a pleasure to hear from UBA Bank Plc. I'm quite intrigued by the offer of receiving my funds through an ATM VISA MASTER CARD. It does sound like a convenient way to access my funds.

However, I have a few questions that I hope you could help me with. Firstly, could you please explain more about how this ATM VISA MASTER CARD works? How is it different from regular ATM cards?

Secondly, regarding the account opening fee and Atm Card processing fee, could you provide more details? Is this a one-time fee or will there be additional charges in the future?

Lastly, I noticed that you mentioned sending the fee through Western Union or World Remit Ria. Could you please elaborate on why these specific services are required?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Deborah
